p: At this point it appears certain that the outbreak, like SARS and MERS, is a new zoonotic transfer, but the animal source remains to be confirmed. Sequencing of virus genomes from five of the first cases identified established that the same virus was present in all five patients, that it was new in that it had limited similarity to the SARS virus (79%) and to the MERS one (52%), and that it may have originated in bats, as it showed higher similarity (87%) to viruses found in Chinese horseshoe bats, ZC45 and ZXC21 (Chinese Medical Journal (2020) https://doi.org/10.1097/CM9.0000000000000722).
